summary: Place 56 Creatures* (with 6 Dracolizards + 2 Giraffes + 2 Indricotheriums + 2 Kakapos + 1 Okapi + 1 Explosive Chicken + 1 Chimp) wherever you want through Skyrim ...
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size=5]Repopulate Skyrim with Creatures*[/size][/b][/color]

[b][i] Place 56 Creatures* (with 6 Dracolizards + 2 Indricotheriums + 2 Giraffes + 2 Kakapos + 1 Okapi + 1 Explosive Chicken + 1 Chimp) wherever you want through Skyrim ... [/i][/b]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/cqpvy0F.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][b] HORDES of Creatures*[/b][/color]

This mod adds the ability to quickly create hordes of creatures* (5, 15, 50, 100 ...MORE ?...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !)

To obtain these creatures*, simply buy scrolls found with some Merchants in Whiterun: [color=#00ff00][i][b]Arcadia of Arcadia’s Cauldron, Anoriath, Hulda of the Bannered Mare [/b][/i][/color] Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into creatures.

In order to find the scrolls at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list when you launch the game.

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18041806001716616015675321.jpg][img]http://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/04/18//18041806001716616015675321.jpg[/img][/url]

*List of Creatures :

1) Mudcrab (Vasard)
2) Chaurus
3) White Spider (Givrépeire)
4) Slaughterfish (Poisson carnassier)
5) Werewolf (Loup-garou)
6) Dwarven Centurion (Centurion Dwemer)
7) Dwarven Sphere (Sphère Dwemer)
8) Dwarven Spider (Araignée Dwemer)
9) Frost Atronach (Atronach de glace)
10) Flame Atronach (Atronach de feu)
11) Spriggan
12) Matron spriggan
13) Skeleton (Squelette)
14) Spectral Draugr
15) Storm Atronach (Atronach de Foudre)
16) Skeever (Ragnard)
17) White Skeever
18) Fox (Renard)
19) Arctic Fox
20) Dog (Chien)
21) Spectral Dog (FOLLOWER)
22) Cow (Vache)
23) Spectral Cow
24) Painted Cow (FOLLOWER)
25) Domestic Goat (Chèvre) (FOLLOWER)
26) Wild Goat
27) Spectral Goat
28) Horse (Cheval) (MOUNT)
29) Spectral Horse (MOUNT)
30) Mammoth (Mammouth)
31) Moose (Elan)
32) White Stag (Cerf Blanc)
33) Red Wolf (Loup)
34) Fire Wolf
35) Horker (Horqueur)
36) Snow Bear (Ours)
37) Chicken (Poulet)
38) Explosive Chicken
39) Spectral Chicken
40) Rabbit (Lapin)
41) Sabrecat (Smilodon)
42) Snowy Sabrecat
43) Forktail (FOLLOWER) (MOUNT)
44) Royal Forktail (MOUNT)
45) Blind Dracolizard (MOUNT) (warning : very agressive creature)
46) Slyzard (FOLLOWER) (MOUNT)
47) Slyzard Mother (MOUNT)
48) Archlyzard (FOLLOWER) (MOUNT)
49) Wild Kakapo
50) Follower Kakapo (FOLLOWER)
51) Okapi (MOUNT)
52) Hammerfell's Giraffe (MOUNT)
53) Jumae Giraffe (MOUNT)
54) Indricotherium (MOUNT)
55) Young Indricotherium (MOUNT)
56) Chimp (you can also buy a book/spell to ride this creature at Farengar)

[URL=https://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18072602525116616015822964.jpg][IMG]https://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/07/26//18072602525116616015822964.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18042103513516616015679475.jpg][img]http://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/04/21//18042103513516616015679475.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b] CREDITS[/b][/color]

[color=#ff0000]Mihail Romanov[/color] for the Dracolizards in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90557/] Dracolizards- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons- witcher wyvern- dragon) [/url], for the Kakapo in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89772] Pheasants Ducks and Chickens- Elements of Skyrim pt.13 (mihail immersive add-ons- animal- birds) [/url], for the Chimp in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92696/]Summon Army of Chimps- Mihail Powers and Spells (mihail immersive add-ons- monkey- hammerfell) [/url]; and for the Giraffes, the Indricotheriums and the Okapi in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90795] Indricotherium and Giraffids- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons- megafauna- hammerfell) [/url]
